Travelling through an imaginary China, along with her Guardian, Chilie is searching for her missing mother. She is a funny little girl with red hair who loves red chilli-pepper and is very independent and strong-willed.

Chilie is a brain training game developed by Beckoning Cat. It is composed of short animated sequences, quick time events and calculations. Designed with soft visuals using cell-shading, you will follow the adventures of Chilie and her guardian, on the road searching for clues. This interactive story will take you into their everyday life, full of comical situations, where you have to solve simple math-puzzles to progress in the game.
